personal_info.summary: Backend lead with proven expertise in Python, SQL, and frameworks like Django and Flask. Skilled in building and managing APIs, integrating third-party services, and optimizing database solutions. Recognized for leadership abilities, fostering collaboration, and delivering scalable, high-quality projects. Focused on enhancing team synergy, maintaining adaptability, and improving organizational efficiency.

responsibilities: Lead backend development of applications using Django, integrating the API to optimize data and service management in real projects.
Designed and implemented restfulAPIs to ensure efficient communication between systems, improving software interoperability.
Integrated PostgreSQL databases, ensuring optimal performance in queries and handling of large volumes of information.
Promoted good development practices such as modularity, error handling and process optimization, improving code quality and scalability.
Collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to resolve technical challenges, facilitating on-time deliveries and with high quality standards.
Delivered personalized technical support, including tailored advice and detailed reports to meet customer needs.
Performed comprehensive diagnostics and resolved hardware and software issues.
Specialized in custom equipment assembly, preventive maintenance, and repair of PCs, laptops, tablets, and smartphones.
Oversaw inventory control, managed stock levels, and ensured efficient store ordering processes to maintain smooth operations.
Efficiently managed and resolved company-wide incidents across various departments using Mantis.
Provided remote assistance via Zoom, Google Meet, Discord, AnyDesk, and TeamViewer, ensuring timely issue resolution.
Conducted maintenance of workspaces, installed security cameras, and managed structured cabling.
Supervised inventory control, coordinated equipment recycling initiatives, and ensured optimal stock levels.
Delivered preventive maintenance, responded to technical incidents, and performed customized PC assembly tailored to specific roles and needs.

Traffic inspector (2015 - 2018): Order and direct traffic. Exercise control of parking on public roads. Prevent and be the authority for inspection and verification of violations of current regulations on traffic and transportation.
Pretreatment for recycling process or efficient reuse of hardware.

education.degree: University Technician in Computer Application Development
education.institution: National University of the Center of the Province of Buenos Aires
National University of the Center of the Province of Buenos Aires

education.degree: National Bachelor and Facilities Technician in Electromechanics
